experience.title: Systems Engineer
experience.description: During my tenure at TCS I was working for GE Asset management (GEAM) as IT consultant and was part of the Equity Trading Operations team. GEAM is a large asset management firm in US and has about $115 billion worth of asset under its management their core business is investing GE employees’ pension ($50 Billion) rest of the money is from external clients. I was back up Project Lead and part of the team supporting the core trading system and other supporting applications (Totaling about 23 in number) these applications were both in house built and vendor procured and  were used across the board by Traders, Portfolio managers, Research Analyst, Client Investment managers, Trade Operations and Data Operations team (104 End users). I along with my colleagues were part of the day to day operations support for all of this applications from researching issues, enhancing in house built applications, working with vendors to have these applications be available to our end users, We also worked  with GEAM’s accounting partner very closely to reconcile and address any issues prior to trading for any mismatches between the accounting and the trading views. Issues that come about on a daily basis had strict SLA requirement and had to be adhered to, we also had Daily and Monthly metrics reporting to evaluate how well we were performing
